title: BLES01403-[Hitman Absolution][PS3][MaSsUp]
description:
Game            Hitman: Absolution
Developer(s)	IO Interactive
Publisher(s)	Square Enix
Engine	        Glacier 2 
Released	20 November 2012 
                JP 24 January 2013            
Genre	        Action-adventure, stealth
Mode(s)	        Single-player, multiplayer 
CONSOLE         PS3
GAME REGION     BLES01403 (EUR)
---------------------------------------------------
This Backup Game is Copied & Uploaded By MaSsUp . 
The Game is tested On Rogero 4.50 v1.0 .
---------------------------------------------------
"Listen to me. I need you to be brave. A man will come and take you away. I cannot go with you. This is how it has to be. This man is different. He will protect you. Please don't judge him for what he might do. I'm sorry. Maybe someday you'll understand" Diana Burnwood.
---------------------------------------------------
First you need to have "WinRAR" or any other compression program that supports .rar files .
---------------------------------------------------
How to extract the files :
1. Using a mouse press the right button on the file downloaded.
2. Choose "Extract Here" if you want to extract the files at the same Location..
   or choose "Extract files" then provide the specific location .
---------------------------------------------------
How To Install : 
1. Copy The File (BLES01403-[Hitman Absolution]) into USB Drive (Fat32) .
2. Connect The USB Drive to the "PS3" and Launch "Multiman".
3. Open "File manager /mmOS" or just press "Start+Select" at the same time.
4. Copy (BLES01403-[Hitman Absolution]) from : "PS3 Root= dev_usb000" .
5. Paste the copied folder to this Location : "PS3 Root = dev_hdd0 = Games" .
6. Launch the game and Enjoy.
---------------------------------------------------
Note : this Game doesn't require "BD Mirror" setting to work .
---------------------------------------------------
To enable "BD Mirror" Setting : 
1. Launch "Multiman" .
2. Navigate to the game you want to enable "BD Mirror" then press "Square".
3. Under The "Game Cover" Navigate to "BD Mirror" and Press "X" .
